titleStmt.title: Justa sive inferiæ regicidarum or, Tybvrns revels. Presented before Protector Cromwel, Lord President Bradshaw, Lord Deputy Ireton. By Squire Dun, Mercury, and chorus.

notesStmt.note: A satire, in verse - "Hence Caduce, that Sleep-powerful mighty rod,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
